summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 6%) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), light levels (up 3369 lux), and cloud levels (up 474 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1407 m), light levels (up 5708 lux), and rainfall (down 0.2 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 474.1m lower than yesterday, 999.4m lower than past week, 1407.0m lower than past month.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 860m to 3110m and averaged 1399.2m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels. A few light raindrops may fall, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and a mix of sun and clouds. Changeable conditions.
